name: ec2launcher
body:
# Purpose

ec2launcher is a tool to help launch Amazon EC2 instances by providing concepts of _environments_ and _applications_. An _environment_ describes a collection of instances that share common settings. Typical environments might include development, staging and production. In contrast, an _application_ represents a full application stack running on an EC2 instance. Launching a new instance combines the configurations from both an environment and an application.

# Setup

Install the ec2launcher gem:

`gem install ec2launcher`

Create a new workspace for environments and applications:

`ec2launcher init myworkspace`

This creates a directory with the new `myworkspace` that contains a `config.rb`, an `environments` directory and an `applications` directory.
